name: Delicious Sour Sauce Ceviche
desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. The sheer fragrance bowls you over in the first wave, with sourness and spiciness bringing up the rear, granting this fish layers akin to the tides, with you the surfer on a sea of flavor. Even when the tumult has subsided, your yearning remains.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Sour Sauce Ceviche
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sour Sauce Ceviche.

customize.name: Sour Sauce Ceviche
customize.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. The fish — which must be fresh — is first skinned and cut into thick chunks, then marinated in the sour sauce until the fish turns white, after which shredded vegetables are added for seasoning. A combination of sour and spicy flavors, it is one of Natlan's most classic flavors.

customize.name: Suspicious Sour Sauce Ceviche
customize.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. Having not been marinated for nearly long enough, the fish lacks flavor. Fortunately, the fresh ingredients allow the dish as a whole to muddle through, albeit leaving a sense of regret behind.

customize.name: Delicious Sour Sauce Ceviche
customize.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. The sheer fragrance bowls you over in the first wave, with sourness and spiciness bringing up the rear, granting this fish layers akin to the tides, with you the surfer on a sea of flavor. Even when the tumult has subsided, your yearning remains.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...
